text:
Hi everyone,
I'd need clarification regarding HubSpot SMTP API.
We would like to send our transactional emails via SMTP.
if we send an email via HubSpot marketing tools, will this be a different system sending the mail then when we send the mail via SMTP API?
If for the SMTP API mail we will have a different sending system then the HubSpot own system, are we going to have a different SMTP setup? e.g. our own abandoned cart mail can still be sent from a different system then the registration mail.
Thanks, any info is appreciated.
Do you have the transactional email add on?
Not yet. We are evaluating the possibility of getting it
Well if and when you get it, then your transactional emails will be sent from a separate ip address.
